title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7306.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7306.1 - Policy

State Regulations

Each facility shall be operated in a manner that provides
for the adequate supervision of every youth and for a safe and secure
environment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7306.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
